title: Brenden Theatres
description:
Download the FREE Brenden Theatres app and wherever and whenever you’ll be able to effortlessly enjoy all these great features:

EARN VIP REWARDS 
* Download the App, Login or Join the VIP Rewards Program
* Earn Points on All Purchases Through the App
* Keep Track of all Purchases and Rewards

VIEW SHOWTIMES & PURCHASE TICKETS
* Watch Movie Trailers
* Search for Showtimes – Share the Movie & Time with Friends!
* View Ticket Purchase History

comments: This app is only for Brandon theater on Willow Pass in Concord California, so far it's a very good app. I like this theater they have the recliner seats that you get to pick what seat you want also has the restaurant inside very worst the $12.50 a seat.
I much rather use this to get movies over other sites. I'm enjoying the ability to get our order for drinks and foods at the same time as purchasing the movie tickets
Only sees one theater and it isn't near me. There is one in my neighborhood but the app doesn't allow me to see it. This app sucks!

What a horrible app! Why is the Concord cinema the ONLY option? Why does my birthday REPEATEDLY reset itself to January 1, 2000?? Why would you promote such a poorly created app at your movie theaters?? It's too bad b'cuz your theaters are a wonderful family experience. Please improve the app. In the meantime, I'll be uninstalling.
Great App. Love the layout and ease of use, and the rewards program!
hard to get a refund or change movie time.. customer service non existance.. i tried contacting and no response. im out $40! stay with Fandango!
just to get the rating up it deserves better everyone who voted 1 star is just retarded and can't read but good app does what it says
Won't let me login, servers are down
i don't know why the Brendan app for Vegas is not here anymore
